item.title: how to git
item.description: For a few days, I have signed up for a Github in order to contribute to the translation of diverse free-software projects. Even though I have already known its main idea, the proper using of the version control system git has always seemed to me as a complex and far-fetched …
item.dc:creator: bricabrac

item.title: perspectives
item.description:
I do not like to work. At least, I do not like to work when constrained by a hierarchy ; under pressure from the competitive relationship between companies, the sacrosanct principle of economic liberalism and capitalist mode of production ; burdened by the weight of an unpleasant and unfulfilling job.

To make …
